name: PressureUlcerRiskAssessment_LOINC
title: Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment_LOINC
description: Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment, LOINC, Created for NDNQI Pressure Ulcer Risk measure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes codes on neonatal pressure ulcer risk using NSRAS. Documentation on the NSRAS panel indicates that pressure ulcer risk was performed.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this data element will map to "Risk Category/Assessment"),(Inclusion Criteria: Use of the NSRAS scale or evaluation of pressure ulcer risk using the NSRAS.),(Exclusion Criteria: Other than NSRAS scale)

concept.display: Neonatal skin risk assessment scale panel [NSRAS]
